oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Casualty List for 5th Regiment, Wisconsin Infantry Volunteers
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: List of casualties for the 5th Regiment, Wisconsin Infantry Volunteers during the Battle of Little Sayler's Creek (also known as Sailor's Creek), or Harpers Farm fought on April 6, 1865. Written by William W. Allen, 2nd Assistant Surgeon. Shows soldier's company, rank, name, and the surgeon's notes about his condition.
